description.message: Helps users access their web services while travelling outside mainland China.

mode_lite_description.message: Applies to <abbr id="tooltip" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="For example, Bilibili">only few websites</abbr>, but can work with other proxy settings or software.

mode_normal_description.message: Recommended. Fast, and applicable to most websites.

faq.message: If you have encountered any issue, please refer to the FAQ.

feedback.message: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

rating.message: If you find this extension helpful, please help us to rate it.

support_message.message: Please donate to us to make Unblock Youku more usable.

support_button.message: Donate to us

waitlist_message.message: Please join to our waitlist, be the first in know new features.

waitlist_sent.message: E-mail sent! Thank you.

waitlist_email_not_valid.message: E-mail must be a valid e-mail address!

login_title.message: or Log in with your credentials

login_message.message: Type your username or e-mail and your password.
